definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神廟是埃及至今保存最完好的神廟。

sentences.english: It's endless work maintaining the building in good repair.
sentences.chinese: 要維持這座大樓完好無損真是個沒完沒了的活。

sentences.english: Threaded holes and studs shall be in good condition and not damaged or worn in any way.
sentences.chinese: 有螺紋的孔和螺栓應完好，並無任何毀壞或磨損。
這些零件完好地焊在一起了。

sentences.english: If you remember we looked at deductive arguments sound.
sentences.chinese: 如果你記得我們看演繹論點的完好。

sentences.english: But few of the bowls had ever been found intact.
sentences.chinese: 但是完好無缺的很少發現。

sentences.english: Croatia is well-known for its preserved environment and unspoilt surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞是衆所周知的完好的環境和未受破壞的環境。

sentences.english: Luckily a team of third-party experts will help make sure the house is as good as the buyer says.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是第三方團隊專家會幫助確認房子的完好無損。

sentences.english: The superior geographical position is one which of substantial clauses Xuankong Temple can preserve complete.
sentences.chinese: 優越的地理位置是懸空寺能完好保存的重要原因之一。

sentences.english: In a boat-shaped Muguan, a well-preserved woman.
sentences.chinese: 在一船形木棺中，有一具保存完好的女屍。

sentences.english: Ensure back up rolls have correct barrel and relief.
sentences.chinese: 確保支撐輥的輥身完好，恰當的輥端倒角設計。

sentences.english: What I want to do is to palpate your gums to make sure that they're nice and firm.
sentences.chinese: 我要做的是觸摸你的牙齦以確定其完好和堅固。

sentences.english: Check to see that water and sewage lines are intact before using the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 入廁前要檢查水管與下水道管道，確保它們完好無損。

sentences.english: We trust that the goods will reach you in perfect condition.
sentences.chinese: 我方相信貨物能夠完好無損地抵達你處。

sentences.english: As we walked, I noticed a grocery store that appeared to be intact.
sentences.chinese: 路上我注意到一家食品雜貨店似乎完好無損。

sentences.english: Of the 462 cases in the container, only one survived intact.
sentences.chinese: 集裝箱中裝的462個箱子中，只有一個完好無損。

definition: to conserve/to preserve/to keep/to save (a file etc) (computing)
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
